'''''Risk: The Lord of the Rings Trilogy Edition''''' is a modification of ''[[wikipedia:Risk (game)|Risk]]'', published in [[2003]] by Hasbro. It serves as merchandise to [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]] and follows the earlier ''[[Risk: The Lord of the Rings: The Middle-earth Conquest Game]]''.

The detailed gameboard reflects a complete map of [[Middle-earth]] including the [[Gondor]], [[Mordor]], and [[Haradwaith]] territories, areas that had not appeared in ''The Middle-earth Conquest Game''.

==From the publisher==

In this expanded edition of RISK The Lord of the Rings Trilogy edition you will find: 
*The detailed gameboard reflects a complete map of Middle-Earth including the Gondor, Mordor, and Haradwaith territories.
*Includes materials from the entire Lord of the Rings film trilogy.
*Additional Territory cards.
*Additional Battalions.
*Additional Adventure Cards.
*Alternate ways to play including special rules for alliance team play.
